text:
Vacancy: Chief Product Officer 
Company: FinTech startup 
Working mode: hybrid/office-based  (Cyprus)  
Salary: from EUR 9,000 net per month (relocation support if needed) 

üî∏About the project:
We're seeking an experienced Product Manager for our new project.
As a Gateway Product Manager, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of the company by overseeing the development and management of our gateway product line. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to drive product development and ensure the successful launch and ongoing improvement of our gateway products.

If you like a fast paced, dynamic and start-up work culture with full of passionate and enthusiastic mindsets, you‚Äôre most welcome to explore the opportunity. This is a chance to take part in an exciting journey as the company grows and expands its business at a rapid pace.

üî∏Your key responsibilities:
‚Äì Lead the end-to-end product lifecycle for our Merchant API, from ideation to launch and ongoing enhancements
‚Äì Conduct thorough market research and analysis to understand merchant needs, industry trends, and competitor offerings
‚Äì Collaborate closely with cross-functional developer teams
‚Äì Define and prioritize the product roadmap and feature backlog based on business goals and customer feedback
‚Äì Monitor key performance metrics, conduct data analysis, and gather user feedback to continuously improve the product's performance and user experience
‚Äì Stay up-to-date with industry developments and emerging technologies related to payment APIs and merchant integrations

üî∏Your expertise to meet the requirement:
‚Äì Previous experience as a Product Manager, specifically working with payment APIs or similar products
‚Äì In-depth understanding of the merchant payment ecosystem and related technologies
‚Äì Proven track record of successfully managing and delivering complex software products within cross-functional teams
‚Äì Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate market insights into actionable product strategies
‚Äì Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively work with stakeholders at all levels
‚Äì Technical background or proficiency in working with engineering teams is highly desired
‚Äì Familiarity with industry-leading payment providers is a plus

üî∏How to apply:
Interested? Please contact @dikaya2
